text: To nakazaniye, o kotorom preduprezhdayet vas Allakh, i nagrada, kotoruyu On obeshchayet v Den' voskreseniya, kogda On soberot vas vsekh k Sebe i vashi deyaniya budut podschityvat'sya, - vso eto obyazatel'no nastupit, - i vy ne budete v sostoyanii otmenit' ili otvesti eto, ne smozhete uklonit'sya ot Sudnogo dnya i uyti ot rasplaty
